metadata.prompt: An epic, cinematic title card. "STERILIZATION: The Final Boss" in a cool, metallic font.
An animation showing disinfectant "bouncing off" a tough, armored bacterial spore. The spore character looks tough and resistant.

A split screen. On the left, a sleek, modern Autoclave with steam effects, labeled "AUTOCLAVE (Steam + Pressure)". On the right, a Dry Heat Sterilizer with heatwave effects, labeled "DRY HEAT (High Temp)".
A shot of a gloved hand carefully placing a sealed sterilization pouch containing metal tools into an autoclave.
The autoclave door closes, and an animation shows the tough bacterial spores from the earlier image being zapped and destroyed by the intense heat and pressure inside.
A shot of a fresh, sterile pouch being opened in front of a client, with steam gently rising. The tools inside are pristine.
A final shot of an esthetician confidently and safely performing a service, with the autoclave visible but out of focus in the background, symbolizing the highest level of professional care.
